description: Data was extracted from GDC in {---tag-release-month-year---}. This table contains COSMIC cancer classification information.

fields.name: COSMIC_PHENOTYPE_ID
fields.description: Unique COSMIC identifier for the classification.

fields.name: SITE_PRIMARY
fields.description: The primary tissue/cancer from which the sample originated. More details on the tissue classification are avaliable from http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/classification. In COSMIC we have standard classification system for tissue types and sub types because they vary a lot between different papers.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE1
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin in publication.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE2
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin in publication.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE3
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin in publication.

fields.name: HISTOLOGY
fields.description: The histological classification of the sample in publication.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE1
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample in publication.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE2
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample in publication.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE3
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample in publication.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE1_COSMIC
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin in COSMIC.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE2_COSMIC
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin in COSMIC.

fields.name: SITE_SUBTYPE3_COSMIC
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin in COSMIC.

fields.name: HISTOLOGY_COSMIC
fields.description: The histological classification of the sample in COSMIC.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE1_COSMIC
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample in COSMIC.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE2_COSMIC
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample in COSMIC.

fields.name: HIST_SUBTYPE3_COSMIC
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample in COSMIC.

fields.name: NCI_CODE
fields.description: NCI thesaurus code for tumour histological classification.
